summary: Productivity-focused iOS Engineer with 4+ years of experience, specializing in integrating AI tools like Claude Code and Gemini CLI into development workflows to maximize efficiency. Experienced in building scalable applications across diverse domains, from medical tech to Vision Pro spatial computing, using SwiftUI and TCA. I actively build custom tools to automate workflows and enhance developer productivity. Deeply committed to fostering a culture of collective growth through active code reviews and mentoring over 40 aspiring developers and students.

experience.companyDescription: Medical device company specializing in ring-type blood pressure monitors (CART BP)
achievements: Participating in SwiftUI + TCA + Tuist migration project

experience.companyDescription: Spatial computing R&D startup (subsidiary of VA Corporation)
achievements: Vision Pro R&D and prototype app development and planning
Developed spatial weather app and furniture placement app for Vision Pro

experience.companyDescription: Short-form content-based marketing platform (Series A funded)
achievements: Operated the Dot Slash Dash app and developed new features

experience.companyDescription: Child care matching platform (Series B funded)
achievements: Operated and developed features for Parent and Teacher apps
Responsible for Q&A, mentoring, and project evaluation for ~40 students
Supported SwiftUI, UIKit, and Advanced iOS Programming courses

experience.companyDescription: Online education program for university students in Gyeongsang province
achievements: Taught 80+ students in Beginner/Intermediate iOS Development (twice a week, 8 weeks)
Delivered Swift basics, iOS programming fundamentals, and mentored individual projects

projects.name: Weather Watch (Vision Pro App)
descriptions: Developed a real-time weather information widget app for Apple Vision Pro.
Established understanding of spatial computing and the development process for spatial apps.
Documented the development process for designers and planners after studying official Apple documentation.

projects.name: Dot Slash Dash App Renewal
projects.techStack: SwiftUI, AVFoundation, MVVM, JavaScript, Rich Editor
descriptions: Full renewal project for video selection, memo writing, editing, and uploading features.
Completed and improved features in an unfinished project → Enhanced code analysis skills.
Improved the WebView-based Rich Editor → Increased adaptability to unfamiliar languages and platforms.
Introduced and actively participated in code reviews within the iOS team → Improved collaboration through PRs.

projects.name: Tjakkak Crocodile Parent & Teacher iOS Apps
projects.techStack: UIKit, SnapKit, ReactorKit, RxSwift, Fastlane, Clean Architecture
descriptions: Developed and operated the Parent App (notice search/application) and Teacher App (education/care management).
Migrated from AutoResize (Storyboard) to AutoLayout (SnapKit) → Resolved view bugs and merge conflicts.
Removed global superclass dependencies → Reduced potential for unexpected errors.
Improved WebView event bridge functions → Enabled rapid response to frontend requests.
Refactored inconsistent MVP patterns to ReactorKit → Accelerated bug fixes and feature additions.
Built a Design System and developed Custom UI → Improved communication with design team and development speed.

projects.name: Tjakkak Crocodile Teacher App Flutter Migration
descriptions: Project to rebuild the native iOS app using Flutter.
Implemented iOS environment setup and onboarding screens.
Started project after 2 weeks of Flutter study → Quickly learned and presented a prototype, gaining C-level trust.
Enhanced understanding of declarative UI and state management.

activities: Resume mentoring for graduates of the Naeil Learning Camp App Developer Course (23.11 ~ 23.12).
Mentoring for 'Tasty Code' (Vocational High School iOS Course) (22.08 ~ 22.09).
Code Reviewer & Mentor for Yagom Academy (iOS Developer Course) (21.11 ~ 24.04).
Conducted 2 MVVM Special Lectures at Yagom Academy (23.05, 24.02).
Maintained 99% app stability using Firebase Crashlytics.
Established automated deployment using Fastlane and Firebase AppDistribution.
Introduced Code Conventions, GitFlow, Code Reviews, and Notion documentation to the iOS team.
